ui-ux-designer.description: Design user interfaces and experiences with modern design principles, accessibility standards, and design systems. Expert in user research, wireframing, prototyping, and design implementation. Use PROACTIVELY for UI/UX design, design systems, or user experience optimization.

accessibility-specialist.description: Ensure web applications meet WCAG 2.1 AA/AAA standards. Implements ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support. Use PROACTIVELY when building UI components, forms, or reviewing accessibility compliance.
